00038         do { \
00039             const uint8_t debug_pattern = CONFIG_OS_DEBUG_UINT8_PATTERN; \
00040             int i; \
00041             for (i=0; i<stack_size; i++) { \

00046 #define HOOK_OS_DEBUG_TICK() \
00047         do { \
00048             struct os_task *current_task = os_task_get_current(); \
00049             if (current_task != NULL && \
00050                     *((uint8_t *) current_task->stack) != CONFIG_OS_DEBUG_UINT8_PATTERN) { \
00051                 HOOK_OS_STACK_OVERFLOW(); \
00052                 while (true); \
00053             } \
00054         } while (false);
